remarks: Nonnegative integer exponentiation of a quotient.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
statement:
expcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
mulexpd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
sqdivd.3 $e |- ( ph -> B =/= 0 ) $.
expdivd.3 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
expdivd $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A / B ) ^ N ) = ( ( A ^ N ) / ( B ^ N ) ) ) $.
